__e: You will be picked up from your hotel in Cusco at 4:45am (04h45) and travel through the Sacred Valley of the Incas until you arrive to Ollantaytambo train station where you will board the train to Machu Picchu. The train from Ollantaytambo to Machu Picchu is one of the most incredible train journeys in the world. Following the route of the Urubamba River all the way to the cloud forest that surrounds Machu Picchu, you will enjoy the beautiful scenery of the high Andes throughout the entire journey.
